metadata.title: CVE-2021-28693 on Ubuntu 20.04 LTS (focal) - medium
metadata.description: xen/arm: Boot modules are not scrubbed The bootloader will load bootmodules (e.g. kernel, initramfs...) in a temporary area before they arecopied by Xen to each domain memory. To ensure sensitive data is not leakedfrom the modules, Xen must "scrub" them before handing the page over to theallocator. Unfortunately, it was discovered that modules will not bescrubbed on Arm.

criterions.comment: xen package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
